project.name: SciJava Base POM
project.description: This POM is a base which SciJava-based projects can extend to inherit helpful build configuration. It ensures that projects all use a compatible build environment, including versions of Maven plugins and Java itself. It does _not_ provide any dependency version management; see org.scijava:pom-scijava for that.

banDuplicateClasses.message: No Duplicate Classes Allowed! - For duplicate transitive dependencies, add dependency exclusions. - For duplications between direct dependencies, resolve or add ignored classes to this rule's configuration.
